import React from 'react'; import { CardIcon1 } from "../../assets/icons"; import "./Card.scss"; const Card = ({ image, cityName, users, price, items, bottomTitle }) => { return (

{cityName}

{users} Check Ins
{price ?

{price}

/person
: undefined}

{bottomTitle ? bottomTitle : "Deal Includes:"}

    { items.map((el, id) => (
  • {el.icon} {el.text}
    • )) }
Make a Reservation
) } export default Card;
